rooms.name: Lobby & Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area combining the entry lobby with an expansive living room, decorated in a Bohemian style with rich textures and vibrant colors. It includes seating areas and decorative elements following Vastu for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Modern dining area integrated with the living room, featuring Bohemian decor elements like handcrafted tiles and ethnic patterns. Placement is strategically chosen to enhance family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed for a joint family, incorporating traditional Indian features with modern amenities. The layout aligns with Vastu by keeping the stove in an auspicious corner.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility space for storage of kitchen supplies and cleaning equipment, following functional design principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with Bohemian decor elements. Positioned in a quiet corner to respect privacy while being accessible from common areas.

rooms.name: Study/Reading Room
rooms.description: Dedicated space for study and reading, integrating natural light and traditional design motifs, with Vastu considerations for intellectual activities.

openings.description: Handcrafted wooden door designed in a Bohemian style. Positioned in alignment with Vastu for positive energy.
Large window providing ample natural light, decorated with traditional motifs and in line with Vastu guidelines.
Overhanging balcony offering views of the garden and swimming pool, enhancing the Bohemian ambiance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony. Decorated in rich Bohemian style, ensuring Vastu guidelines for the head of the family.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-appointed bedroom designed to accommodate extended family members, featuring traditional and modern decor that respects cultural aesthetics.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample natural light. Designed in Bohemian style with earthy tones and textures, aligning with Vastu principles for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom meant for occasional guests or younger family members. Features a modest Bohemian decor style in accordance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Cloakroom/Storage
rooms.description: Functional cloakroom for changing and storage, designed to serve all residents of the joint family.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase in keeping with Indian architectural aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.
Private balcony for the master bedroom offering serene views of the garden and swimming pool.

rooms.name: Study & Library
rooms.description: Dedicated study area with built-in bookshelves. Designed in a fusion of Bohemian and modern styles, ensuring ample light per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Suite
rooms.description: Fully equipped guest suite with private bathroom facilities. Embraces Bohemian decor that is both inviting and respectful of traditional aesthetics.

openings.description: Access to the roof terrace which doubles as an outdoor relaxation and social space. Decorated with Bohemian elements in line with Vastu recommendations for positive energy.

rooms.name: Garden & Pool Area
rooms.description: Expansive garden featuring native landscaping, water features and a central swimming pool. The design follows Indian residential aesthetics with a Bohemian touch and Vastu guidelines for harmonious energy flow.

openings.description: A welcoming stone pathway leading from the entrance into the lush garden area.

rooms.name: Pool House / Spa Area
rooms.description: Dedicated pool house that houses a small spa and lounge area adjacent to the swimming pool. Designed in a Bohemian style with a touch of modern comfort while respecting Vastu energy principles.

openings.description: A door connecting the pool house to the garden area for seamless access.
